fotoshop.Events

Class PropertyMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • fotoshop.Events.PropertyMessage

  • public class PropertyMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    PropertyMessage is used to pass various values to the Editor process command method via a Command object.
